#summary One-sentence summary of this page.
Summarizes the TA1 project for cs373.
= Introduction =

The proposed system for assigning TAs is analogous to match-making
software (think E-Harmony).

= Details =

There are three groups of users for the proposed system:

1. http://cs373-54270c/Applicants will specify their background and the (types of) courses
they are best qualified to TA

2. http://cs373-54270c/Instructors will specify the (type of) graduate student(s) they would
like to have serve as TA(s) in their class

3. http://cs373-54270c/Administrators will edit and/or accept the matchings suggested by the
system
